Package com.notonthehighstreet.promotion

Class UnitPriceReductionRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.notonthehighstreet.promotion.AbstractPromotionRule
      • com.notonthehighstreet.promotion.UnitPriceReductionRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PromotionRule
    public class UnitPriceReductionRule
extends AbstractPromotionRule
    BuyAndGetFreeRule class is the implementation class of PromotionRule. It models the promotion rule of buy (minimumUnits) or more items then the unit price drops to (reducedPrice).
